meanings.definition: To make a mess of something
meanings.sent1: I bollixed up the recipe by adding too much salt.
meanings.sent2: She always manages to bollix things when under pressure.
meanings.sent3: He bollixed the presentation by mixing up the slides.
meanings.sent4: The chef bollixed the dish by burning it to a crisp.
meanings.sent5: The team bollixed the project by missing the deadline.
